title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, plugins).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop GUI for Ollama; cross-platform, <10 MB installer.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the REST API with fuzzy-find model picker, chat REPL, and progress bars.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; Android compatible, coroutines support, Spring Boot starter included.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem exposing Ollama API with ActiveModel-style DSL and Rails generator.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with GPU support, Open-WebUI, nginx, and automatic model preload.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart for deploying Ollama plus optional WebUI, ingress, and HorizontalPodAutoscaler.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG with Chroma, function-calling, fine-tune adapters, Whisper transcriptions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for production pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot with slash commands, thread-based chats, and per-server model settings.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels/DMs with context threading and file uploads.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama as async views, admin actions, and REST endpoints via Django-REST-Framework.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service layer that proxies and extends Ollama with JWT auth, usage quotas, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template using Ollama for generation and Chroma for retrieval with PDF upload.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI example that embeds Ollama via REST for native macOS chat with menu-bar extras.
